mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter to the editor regarding George Washington's first inauguration, 1839
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This letter was addressed to Col. William L. Stone, editor of the New York Commercial Advertiser. It offers an eye-witness account of George Washington's arrival in New York City for his first inauguration as president, written to correct an earlier published reminiscence by a Mr. Denini entitled 'Half Century Reminiscence' that appeared in the Commercial Advertiser. Whether this letter was also published is not yet determined. Autograph letter, 2 pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, George, 1732-1799--Inauguration
